import React,{useContext} from 'react' import styles from '../styles/Nav.module.css' import {UserContext} from 'pages/index' import Link from 'next/link' import Router from 'next/router' function nav() { const userContext = useContext(UserContext) return (

{userContext.name} { userContext.isLogin && userContext.loginDispatch({type:'logout'})}>Log out }
